details:
verb
- cover with liquid
= synonyms: soak
- slacken
= example: slacken
= synonyms: dowse
- lower quickly
= example: lower quickly
- immerse briefly into a liquid so as to wet, coat, or saturate
= synonyms: dunk
- dip into a liquid
= synonyms: dip
- wet thoroughly
= synonyms: dowse
- put out, as of a candle or a light
= synonyms: put out
